developer-tool.name: Developer Tool
developer-tool.description: A CLI tool that simplifies common development tasks.
developer-tool.problem: Developers repeat the same setup tasks for every new project.
developer-tool.solution: A CLI that automates project scaffolding and configuration.
developer-tool.mission_statement: Reduce time from idea to coding.

mobile-app.name: Mobile App
mobile-app.description: A companion mobile app for the SaaS product.
mobile-app.problem: Users want to access the SaaS on mobile.
mobile-app.solution: Native mobile app with core functionality.
mobile-app.blocked_by: SaaS web app needs to be complete first
